thread.title: Call for Melania Trump's immigration papers
thread.title_full: Call for Melania Trump's immigration papers

author: The Independent
title: Call for Melania Trump's immigration papers
text:
Call for Melania Trump's immigration papers Bye Obama, hello Trump / 1 February 2017, 05:59am The Independent Wife of US President Donald Trump, Melania. Picture: Reuters 
Los Angeles - A California state senator has called for the White House to release Melania Trump’s immigration documents as part of an objection to President Donald Trump’s policies. 
Democrat Nancy Skinner made the call in reaction to the leader’s executive order to restrict funds to “sanctuary cities” - areas controlled by local authorities that refuse to enforce federal immigration policies. 
Skinner said: “No one in the Trump operation has released any of the documentation to indicate what was the circumstance, or whether she (Melania) had full legal status. We only know they had a lawyer look at whatever papers she chose to give." The Independent
